es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.chapter.conversation.node
Class DialogueConversationNode

java.lang.Object
  es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.chapter.conversation.node.ConversationNode
      es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.chapter.conversation.node.DialogueConversationNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConversationNodeView, Cloneable
public class DialogueConversationNode
extends ConversationNode

This conversational node contains a variable number of dialogue lines, between player characters and non-player characters. This node has a single link to another node, of any kind

Field Summary

          Conversational line's vector
